General.Name: Shan Dong Delisi Food Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Delisi Food Co., Ltd. engages in live pigs slaughtering business in China. The company offers low-temperature, fermented, chilled, and quick-frozen meat products; and beef products, Chinese sauces, prepared dishes, rice noodles and condiments. It also trades in beef. Shandong Delisi Food Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Zhucheng, China.

2.Name: Mr. Peng  Liu
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
